original: aashta ma h'a sth'a na tsee ta ban da n'a ma sta ba:/
analyzed: aashta ma h'a sth'a na tsee ta ban da n'a ma sta ba:/

original: gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa //
analyzed: gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa //
translated: The Praise of Prostrating to the Stūpas of the Eight Great Sacred Sites

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: bltams dang byang chub mnyam med chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor //
analyzed: bltams dang byang chub mnyam med chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor //
translated: Birth, enlightenment, turning the wheel of the unexcelled virtuous Dharma,🔽The first stūpa, the three worlds’ offerings, great miracles,🔽The place of descent from the gods, shining like the color of the snow mountain,

original: mchod rten thog mar 'jig rten gsum mchod dang ldan cho 'phrul chen po dang // gang ri'i kha dog ltar gsal lha las babs pa'i gnas 'di dang // gang du bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa de la spyi bos bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: mchod rten thog mar 'jig rten gsum mchod dang ldan cho 'phrul chen po dang // gang ri'i kha dog ltar gsal lha las babs pa'i gnas 'di dang // gang du bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa de la spyi bos bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: And where the Sugata passed into nirvāṇa—I bow my head to all of them.🔽Vārāṇasī, the place of killing children, the terrifying bank of the river,

original: yangs can w'a r'a na s'i byis pa gsod ri 'jigs rungs bcings 'gram dang // mnyan yod dang ni byang chub shing @241a * //
analyzed: yangs can w'a r'a na s'i byis pa gsod ri 'jigs rungs bcings 'gram dang // mnyan yod dang ni byang chub shing @241a * //

original: drung ku sha'i srong mchog ser skya lumbi n'i //
analyzed: drung ku sha'i srong mchog ser skya lumbi n'i //
translated: In the grove of the supreme sage Kapila in Lumbinī.

original: koo shambi dang mdzod mthug mnyam pa'i grong mchog dpa' skyong yul 'khor dang // stobs bcu ldan pa'i mchod rten gzhan gang yin pa de la'ang spyis phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: koo shambi dang mdzod mthug mnyam pa'i grong mchog dpa' skyong yul 'khor dang // stobs bcu ldan pa'i mchod rten gzhan gang yin pa de la'ang spyis phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage with my head to the ground to the supreme city of Kauśambī, equal to the thick treasury, the land of Vīra, and to the other caityas of the one with ten powers.🔽To Kashmir, the land of China, Yamu,

original: kha che dang ni rgya yul khab ya mun zhes pa dang // singga la dang ao te sindhu shing 'phal ba ga mang ba kha ko la //
analyzed: kha che dang ni rgya yul khab ya mun zhes pa dang // singga la dang ao te sindhu shing 'phal ba ga mang ba kha ko la //
translated: Siṃhala, Oḍre, Sindhu, Śālmali, and Kākola,

original: bal yul k'a ma r'u dang bum pa'i klong mchog k'anytsi bzang po'i yul //
analyzed: bal yul k'a ma r'u dang bum pa'i klong mchog k'anytsi bzang po'i yul //
translated: To Nepal, Kāmarūpa, and the supreme land of Kañcī, the land of good pots,

original: stobs bcu ldan pa'i gdung bcas gzhan gang yin pa de la'ang spyis phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: stobs bcu ldan pa'i gdung bcas gzhan gang yin pa de la'ang spyis phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage with my head to the ground to the other caityas of the one with ten powers.

original: ti se gangs ri gangs can la gnas mand'a ra dang ri rab rtse //
analyzed: ti se gangs ri gangs can la gnas mand'a ra dang ri rab rtse //
translated: To the snow mountain of Kailash, the snowy abode, to Mandāra, to the peak of Meru,

original: klu gnas rnam rgyal nod sbyin gnas dang rig 'dzin grub pa'i gnas //
analyzed: klu gnas rnam rgyal nod sbyin gnas dang rig 'dzin grub pa'i gnas //
translated: To the abode of the nāgas, to the abode of the victorious, to the abode of Kubera, to the abode of the siddhas of the vidyādharas,

original: tshangs dang khyab 'jug gnas dang phyugs bdag nyi ma zla ba'i gnas //
analyzed: tshangs dang khyab 'jug gnas dang phyugs bdag nyi ma zla ba'i gnas //
translated: To the abode of Brahmā and Viṣṇu, to the abode of Śiva, to the abode of the sun and moon,

original: stobs bcu ldan pa'i mchod rten gzhan gang yin pa de la'ang spyis phyag 'tshal //🔽stobs bcu las byung rin chen snying can mchod rten brgyad po gdung bcas bum las gru ba //
analyzed: stobs bcu ldan pa'i mchod rten gzhan gang yin pa de la'ang spyis phyag 'tshal // stobs bcu las byung rin chen snying can mchod rten brgyad po gdung bcas bum las gru ba //
translated: I bow my head to all the other caityas of the ten powers.🔽The eight caityas of the ten powers, which are the heart of jewels, are square, with a vase, and have relics.🔽The caityas of the ten powers, which are the heart of jewels, are square, with a vase, and have relics.🔽The caitya of the ten powers, which is the heart of jewels, is square, with a vase, and has relics.
